install.name: Announcements Display
install.author: HUBzero
install.description: This module allows the display of announcements

param.name: container
param.label: Content Container
param.description: A CSS ID for a content container

param.name: numitems
param.label: Items
param.description: Enter number of news items to display

param.name: show_morelink
param.label: More link
param.description: Show 'read more' link for each announcement

param.name: show_viewall
param.label: View all link
param.description: Show 'view all' link for all announcements

param.name: show_search
param.label: Item search
param.description: Show a search box for announcements

param.name: show_subscribe
param.label: Subscribtion option
param.description: Show an option to subscribe to feed/maillist

param.name: webpath
param.label: Image path
param.description: Enter the path to item images

param.name: default_image
param.label: Default image
param.description: Enter full path to the default image

param.name: subscribe_path
param.label: Path to subscription page
param.description: Enter the url of rss feed or maillist subscription page

param.name: subscribe_label
param.label: Label for subscribe link
param.description: Enter the text for the subscription link

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
